name: MISP
description: Malware Information and Sharing Platform (MISP) threat intelligence platform

options.name: MISP URL
options.description: URL of your MISP instance to include the schema (i.e., https://) and port if applicable

options.name: Enable Adding Tags
options.description: If checked, users can add tags to an event from the Overlay Window

options.name: Enable Removing Tags
options.description: If checked, users can remove tags from an event from the Overlay Window

options.name: Ignored Entities
options.description: List of domains and IPs that you never want to send to misp

options.name: Ignored Domain Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up.

options.name: Ignored IP Regex
options.description: IPs that match the given regex will not be looked up.
